title: Enchanting Emerald Polki Jhumki: Timeless Elegance
materials: Natural Emerald (పచ్చ). Hyderabadi Polish finish for lasting luster. The gold has been hallmarked for authenticity.
features: Classic Jhumka design with a central oval-cut emerald embraced by a floral halo of Polki diamonds. Geometric Polki diamond shapes form the upper part of the earring, leading to the embellished Emerald centre. The Polki diamonds are set in a traditional Kundan style, highlighting the natural beauty of each uncut stone. The meticulous craftsmanship reflects the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry making.
colors: and sparkling white Polki diamonds create a harmonious and eye-catching color palette.
occasions: and special occasions like engagements (నిశ్చితార్థం) and anniversaries. Adds a touch of traditional glamour to any outfit
description: This Jhumki is a masterpiece of traditional craftsmanship, showcasing the timeless beauty of Polki diamonds and emeralds. Each Polki diamond is unique, adding to the piece's charm and value. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a long-lasting shine, making it a treasured heirloom for generations to come. A symbol of prosperity and good fortune, these earrings are an investment in both beauty and heritage.
